title: InputDataFile
description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

datamodel__input__static__General.title: BidDSJsonModel
datamodel__input__static__General.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

timestamp_start.title: timestamp_start
timestamp_start.description: Period beginning timestamp for the first interval with Timestamp format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm at UTC

timestamp_stop.title: timestamp_stop
timestamp_stop.description: Period beginning timestamp for the interval following the last interval with Timestamp format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm at UTC

season.title: season
season.description: Season of the year the problem lies within

electricity_demand.title: electricity_demand
electricity_demand.description: How demand compares to other times of the year/season

vre_availability.title: vre_availability
vre_availability.description: How variable renewable energy availability compares to other times of the year/season

solar_availability.title: solar_availability
solar_availability.description: How solar availability compares to other times of the year/season

wind_availability.title: wind_availability
wind_availability.description: How wind availability compares to other times of the year/season

weather_temperature.title: weather_temperature
weather_temperature.description: How outside temperature compares to other times of the year/season

day_type.title: day_type
day_type.description: What kind of weekday is represented

net_load.title: net_load
net_load.description: How the net-load profile compares to other times of the year/season

ViolationCostsParameters.title: BidDSJsonModel
ViolationCostsParameters.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

p_bus_vio_cost.title: p_bus_vio_cost
p_bus_vio_cost.description: Bus violation costs for active power violation (\$/pu-h)

q_bus_vio_cost.title: q_bus_vio_cost
q_bus_vio_cost.description: Bus violation costs for reactive power violation  (\$/pu-h)

s_vio_cost.title: s_vio_cost
s_vio_cost.description: Branch violation costs for thermal violation (\$/pu-h)

BusInitialStatus.title: BidDSJsonModel
BusInitialStatus.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

Bus.title: BidDSJsonModel
Bus.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

active_reserve_uids.title: active_reserve_uids
active_reserve_uids.description: List of active reserve zones (uids) that the bus participating

reactive_reserve_uids.title: reactive_reserve_uids
reactive_reserve_uids.description: List of reactive reserve zones (uids) that the bus participating

initial_status.title: initial_status
initial_status.description: A JSON inner object storing data   for initial time step

ShuntInitialStatus.title: BidDSJsonModel
ShuntInitialStatus.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

Shunt.title: BidDSJsonModel
Shunt.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

initial_status.title: initial_status
initial_status.description: A JSON inner object storing data   for initial time step

DispatchableDevices_SimpleProducingConsu.title: BidDSJsonModel
DispatchableDevices_SimpleProducingConsu.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

on_status.title: on_status
on_status.description: On status indicator for initial time step

p.title: p
p.description: { (Case: producer) Active production for initial time step (Float, p.u.) } { (Case: consumer) Active consumption for initial time step

q.title: q
q.description: { (Case: producer) Reactive production for initial time step (Float, p.u.) } { (Case: consumer) Reactive consumption for initial time step

datamodel__input__static__DispatchableDe.title: BidDSJsonModel
datamodel__input__static__DispatchableDe.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

startups_ub.title: startups_ub
startups_ub.description: Array of time interval startup data blocks, where each  data block is an array with exactly three elements:  1) interval starting time (Float, hr), 2) interval ending time (Float, hr), and  3) maximum startups within the interval (Int)

energy_req_ub.title: energy_req_ub
energy_req_ub.description: Array of energy upper bound requirement data blocks, where each  data block is an array with exactly three elements:  1) interval starting time (Float, hr), 2) interval ending time (Float, hr), and  3) maximum energy within the interval (Float, p.u.)

energy_req_lb.title: energy_req_lb
energy_req_lb.description: Array of energy lower bound requirement data blocks, where each  data block is an array with exactly three elements:  1) interval starting time (Float, hr), 2) interval ending time (Float, hr), and  3) minimum energy within the interval (Float, p.u.)

p_ramp_up_ub.title: p_ramp_up_ub
p_ramp_up_ub.description: {(Case: producer) Max production ramp up when operating (Float, p.u./hr)}  {(Case: consumer) Max consumption ramp up when operating

p_ramp_down_ub.title: p_ramp_down_ub
p_ramp_down_ub.description: {(Case: producer) Max production ramp down when operating (Float, pu/hr)}  {(Case: consumer) Max consumption ramp down when operating

p_startup_ramp_ub.title: p_startup_ramp_ub
p_startup_ramp_ub.description: {(Case: producer) Max production ramp up when start up (Float, p.u./hr)}  {(Case: consumer) Max consumption ramp up when start up

p_shutdown_ramp_ub.title: p_shutdown_ramp_ub
p_shutdown_ramp_ub.description: {(Case: producer) Max production ramp down when shut down (Float, pu/hr)}  {(Case: consumer) Max consumption ramp down when shut down

initial_status.title: initial_status
initial_status.description: A JSON inner object storing data for initial time step

p_ramp_res_up_online_ub.title: p_ramp_res_up_online_ub
p_ramp_res_up_online_ub.description: Maximum ramp up reserve when online

p_ramp_res_down_online_ub.title: p_ramp_res_down_online_ub
p_ramp_res_down_online_ub.description: Maximum ramp down reserve when online

p_ramp_res_up_offline_ub.title: p_ramp_res_up_offline_ub
p_ramp_res_up_offline_ub.description: Maximum ramp up reserve when offline

p_ramp_res_down_offline_ub.title: p_ramp_res_down_offline_ub
p_ramp_res_down_offline_ub.description: Maximum ramp down reserve when offline

datamodel__input__timeseries__Dispatchab.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

p_ub.title: p_ub
p_ub.description: { (Case: producer) Upper bound of active dispatch (Array of Float)   } { (Case: consumer) Upper bound of active demand

p_lb.title: p_lb
p_lb.description: { (Case: producer) Lower bound of active dispatch (Array of Float)    } { (Case: consumer) Lower bound of active demand

q_lb.title: q_lb

cost.title: cost
cost.description: Array of cost blocks, where   each cost block is an array with exactly two elements:     1) marginal  cost (\$/p.u.-hr), and 2) block size (p.u.)
